text:
e="preserve">Stanley Earl Robinson (July 14, 1988 – July 21, 2020) was an American professional basketball player. He last played for the Español de Talca of the Liga Nacional de Básquetbol de Chile. He was born in Birmingham, Alabama. From 2011 to 2012, he played for Iowa Energy. Robinson played college basketball with the Connecticut Huskies.
Robinson died on July 21, 2020, a week after his 32nd birthday, at his home in Birmingham.

annotations.surface_form: Liga Nacional de Básquetbol de Chile
